content.text:
# Czech Republic at the 2008 Summer Olympics

 
| location = Beijing
| competitors = 134
| sports = 19
| flagbearer = Štěpánka Hilgertová (opening)Věra Cechlová (closing)
| rank = 24
| gold = 3
| silver = 3
| bronze = 1
| officials =
| appearances = auto
| app_begin_year = 1996
| app_end_year =
| summerappearances =
| winterappearances =
| seealso =  (1900–1912) (1920–1992)
}}
The Czech Republic participated in the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, China. The Czech delegation consisted of around 130 athletes.
